channel.title: Some friends/local bands
channel.description:
All at stake - http://www.myspace.com/allatstakeuk Kids from the summer - http://www.myspace.com/kidsfromthesummerband Show it off - http://www.myspace.com/showitoffofficial My lost obsession - http://www.myspace.com/mylostobsession Same old stories - http://www.myspace.com/sameoldstoriesband
Yeah, just some bands i know, who are friends so :) Check em out. They are all unsigned and some have, well, naff recordings but maybe you'll find someone you like. I like love all at stake and they are a friends band so, thats cool :L

item.title: Some friends/local bands

item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

haha no way man :L I cant believe their unsigned I just… know them i guess through my bro :L Also they played the other week with my bro at a local youth cafe
